question: What paper mitigates the vocabulary size limitation when pretraining multilingual masked language models using a contrastive loss?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: What paper mitigates the vocabulary size limitation when pretraining multilingual masked language models using a contrastive loss?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: Headless Language Models: Learning without Predicting with Contrastive Weight Tying
